q_ch: 分配给Precision Cutters的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the cutting tasks assigned to Precision Cutters?
gt:
Hello there! 😄

I've got the details on the cutting tasks assigned to the "Precision Cutters" working group. Here's a neat table for you:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Product ID | Number of Products |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------|--------------------|
| 18      | March 11, 2024      | April 7, 2024       | 6          | 200                |
| 30      | April 19, 2024      | April 26, 2024      | 24         | 195                |

These tasks are all set and ready to go! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Precision Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Precision Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, op.product_id, op.number FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.working_group_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks assigned to the working group "Precision Cutters"
